item.description:
The Rosebud music is co-posted with Boston Live Music, Social Fun, and to Facebook.

Wall of Sound is performing at the Rosebud Lounge (behind the restaurant there, at 381 Summer St.) at 9:30. Here is a Halloween video:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KSfZEuI10YU

Before going there, we meet at the Burren at 247 Elm Street (1 block away), to fortify ourselves for some dancin' after that. Grab a bite (there is waitservice but ordering food isn't required), or feast on a pint. I'll be standing at the bar then move to a table (back room). There is no cover until 9 PM. WE HAVE RESERVED TABLES IN THE BACK.

http://www.burren.com/

The Rosebud is a pretty big place and there is plenty of space for dancin'. NOTE: Wall of Sound will be preceded by the opening band Throwdown Blues Band. So if you want to skip The Burren, go to the Rosebud at 8 when they play (until 9) and we'll join you later. Another Meetup group, Boston Live Music, is scheduled there at 8.

There's a $5.00 cover.

Note!! The Red Line on weekends from Davis to Harvard is substituted by bus service! The bus heading to Harvard (where the subway resumes) leaves from Davis Sq. on Elm St. nearby the Somerville theater.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be wearing a tweed Irish cap & be in the back room.
item.name: The Burren & Wall of Sound @ Rosebud
